task.en: Help me trim the music `/Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/POSTERITY.mp3` to the first 13 seconds using iMovie. Save it to `Posterity_trimmed.mp3` under Documents.
task.zh: 帮我把`/Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/POSTERITY.mp3`这个音乐用iMovie裁切到只剩前13秒。把它保存为`Posterity_trimmed.mp3`，放在Documents目录下。

pre_command: osascript -e 'quit app "iMovie"' && rm -rf "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" && cp -r "/Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" /Users/ec2-user/Movies/; rm -rf /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/ && cp -r /Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/benchmark_files /Users/ec2-user/Documents; osascript -e 'tell application "iMovie" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "f" using {control down, command down}'
grading_command: mdls -name kMDItemDurationSeconds /Users/ec2-user/Documents/Posterity_trimmed.mp3 2>/dev/null | awk -F= '{ if ($2 >= 10 && $2 <= 16) { print "True" } else { print "False" } }' || echo "False"
